import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' //app logo import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop") return (

Purse

  • {setMenu("shop")}}> Shop {menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}> Men {menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}> Women {menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}> Kids {menu==="kids"?

) } export default Navbar
